summary: This is an automated email notification from ClaimFox, Inc. to Ghislaine Maxwell, informing her that requested banking records from USAA related to a criminal banking claim are available via her ClaimFox Portal. The document references a specific claim and invoice number, indicating a request for financial records in the context of criminal proceedings.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the named claimant for whom banking records from USAA were requested, and she is the recipient of this notification that the records are available.

events.title: Notification of Available Banking Records
events.description: An automated notification is sent to Ghislaine Maxwell informing her that requested banking records from USAA related to a criminal banking claim are available for access via the ClaimFox Portal.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was the subject of a records request to USAA for criminal banking information, as indicated by the 'Criminal Banking' descriptor and her status as claimant.
The request was processed by a third-party service, ClaimFox, Inc., and assigned specific identifiers: Claim #40897182 and Invoice #40659875.
The notification date of December 31, 2019, places this financial records request during the active investigation and pre-trial phase for Maxwell.
